snippet: JAT Capital, founded and run by John A. Thaler, was the darling of Wall Street a year ago but the fund's fast decline since then offers a cautionary tale for investors.
abstract: JAT Capital, founded and run by John A. Thaler, was the darling of Wall Street a year ago but the fund's fast decline since then offers a cautionary tale for investors.

headline.main: JAT Capital, Down 20%, Is a Lesson in Volatility
headline.print_headline: JAT Capital, Down 20%, Is a Lesson In Volatility
